attributes.action: make the House of Lords expenses more transparent & open
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Given the recent unfortunate MPs expenses scandal the House of Lords should be made more transparent so that the public can see that the Lords are not abusing public money/trust.

Along with the planned change to require the Lords to produce receipts for their claims, their calendars should also be published to show the times when they are working at the Lords or are on “Parliamentary business”. This change will prove their integrity to the public as currently all the public can see is how much in total they claimed and how many days they attended the Lords.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
